layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x84
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x84
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x52
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (0,0) size 784x52
        LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x18 [color=#00FF00]
          LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 501x18 [color=#000000]

              text run at (0,0) width 501: "The color of this text should be green when the pointing device hovers over it."
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,0) size 0x0
